node.name: Tweaks
node.shortdescription:
Tweaks
Provides a few enhancements to standard editors:

Findbar: A ctrl-f replacement - embeds the functionality of the find dialog in a bar at the bottom of the current active editor.

Recent Editors: a ctrl-e replacement - provides a swivel popup with:

  1. most recently closed editors list;
  2. bookmarked editors lists; and
  3. most recently opened editors list.

Changed in v0.8:

  • added more keyboard bindings and improved find behaviors.
  • added caret offset display to the statusbar.
node.body:
Tweaks
Provides a few enhancements to standard editors:

Findbar: A ctrl-f replacement - embeds the functionality of the find dialog in a bar at the bottom of the current active editor.

Recent Editors: a ctrl-e replacement - provides a swivel popup with:

  1. most recently closed editors list;
  2. bookmarked editors lists; and
  3. most recently opened editors list.

Changed in v0.8:

  • added more keyboard bindings and improved find behaviors.
  • added caret offset display to the statusbar.
